RegisterDescription.ToolTip: IDS Imaging Development Systems GmbH GenTL Device interface

Category.Name: DeviceInformation
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all Device Information features of the Device module.
Category.Description: Category that contains all Device Information features of the Device module.

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all Device Control features of the Device module.
Category.Description: Category that contains all Device Control features of the Device module.

Category.Name: StreamEnumeration
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all Stream Enumeration features of the Device module.
Category.Description: Category that contains all Stream Enumeration features of the Device module.

Category.Name: customControlChannelMonitor
Category.ToolTip: Shows statistical data on the control channel.
Category.Description: Shows statistical data on the control channel.

Category.Name: customHeartbeatMonitor
Category.ToolTip: Shows some statistical data on the heartbeat.
Category.Description: Shows some statistical data on the heartbeat.

Category.Name: customReconnectMonitor
Category.ToolTip: Shows statistical data on the reconnect feature.
Category.Description: Shows statistical data on the reconnect feature.

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.ToolTip: Interface-wide unique identifier of this device.
StringReg.Description:
Interface-wide unique identifier of this device. Corresponds to the DEVICE_INFO_ID command of DevGetInfo function.
Deprecated (See DeviceSerialNumber).

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.ToolTip: Serial number of the remote device.
StringReg.Description: Serial number of the remote device. Corresponds to the "DeviceSerialNumber" feature of the remote device and usually is retrieved via the bootstrap register of the remote device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.ToolTip: User-programmable device identifier of the remote device.
StringReg.Description: User-programmable device identifier of the remote device. Corresponds to the DeviceUserID feature of the remote device and usually it is retrieved via the bootstrap register of the remote device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the remote device vendor.
StringReg.Description: Name of the remote device vendor. Corresponds to the DEVICE_INFO_VENDOR command of DevGetInfo function.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the remote device model.
StringReg.Description: Name of the remote device model. Corresponds to the DEVICE_INFO_MODEL command of DevGetInfo function.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFamilyName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the product family of the remote device model.
StringReg.Description: Name of the product family of the remote device model. Corresponds to the "DeviceFamilyName" feature of the remote device and usually is retrieved via the bootstrap register of the remote device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: The version of the remote device model.
StringReg.Description: The version of the remote device model. Corresponds to the "DeviceVersion" feature of the remote device and usually is retrieved via the bootstrap register of the remote device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: Manufacturer information about the remote device.
StringReg.Description: Manufacturer information about the remote device. Corresponds to the "DeviceManufacturerInfo" feature of the remote device and usually is retrieved via the bootstrap register of the remote device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transport layer type of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Transport layer type of the device. Corresponds to the DEVICE_INFO_TYPE command of DevGetInfo function.

StringReg.Name: DeviceDisplayName
StringReg.ToolTip: User readable name of the device.
StringReg.Description: User readable name of the device. If this is not defined in the device this should be "VENDOR MODEL (ID)". Corresponds to the DEVICE_INFO_DISPLAYNAME command of DevGetInfo function.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceAccessStatus
Enumeration.Description: Gives the device's access status at the moment of the last execution of the DeviceUpdateList command. This value only changes on execution of the DeviceUpdateList command. Corresponds to the DEVICE_INFO_ACCESS_STATUS command of DevGetInfo function.

EnumEntry.Name: Unknown
EnumEntry.Description: Access status is ot known to the Producer.

EnumEntry.Name: Busy
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device is already opened by another entity.
EnumEntry.Description: The device is already opened by another entity.

EnumEntry.Name: OpenReadWrite
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Open in Read/Write mode by this GenTL host.
EnumEntry.Description: Open in Read/Write mode by this GenTL host.

EnumEntry.Name: OpenReadOnly
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Open in Read access mode by this GenTL host.
EnumEntry.Description: Open in Read access mode by this GenTL host.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceChunkDataFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Chunk data format used by the device.
Enumeration.Description:
Chunk data format used by the device. This information allows devices based on other technologies or protocols than "standard" ones such as GigE Vision to inform the GenTL Consumer about the chunk data layout they use.
Currently not implemented by the IDS GenTL Producer.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device does not use chunk data at all.
EnumEntry.Description: The device does not use chunk data at all.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVision
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Format defined by GigE Vision specification version 1.x.
EnumEntry.Description: The device formats the chunk data using chunk data format defined by GigE Vision specification version 1.x. The chunk data decoding algorithm (chunk adapter) common for the GigE Vision devices can be used.

EnumEntry.Name: Custom
EnumEntry.Description: The device formats the chunk data using a custom, non-standard format. Without a-priori additional knowledge about the device and its implementation, the GenTL Consumer should always use the generic chunk adapter to decode the chunk data, not making any assumptions about the internal chunk data layout.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceEventDataFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enumeration, informing about the event data format used by the device.
Enumeration.Description:
Enumeration, informing about the event data format used by the device (meaning the "device events", see event type EVENT_REMOTE_DEVICE). This allows devices based on other technologies or protocols than "standard" ones such as GigE Vision to inform the GenTL Consumer about the event data layout they use.
Currently not implemented by the IDS GenTL producer.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device does not use event data at all.
EnumEntry.Description: The device does not use event data at all.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVision
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Format defined by GigE Vision specification version 1.x.
EnumEntry.Description: The device formats the event data using event data format defined by GigE Vision specification version 1.x. The event data decoding algorithm (event adapter) common for the GigE Vision devices can be used.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVisionExtendedId
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Format defined by GigE Vision specification version 2.x.
EnumEntry.Description: The device formats the event data using event data format defined by GigE Vision specification version 2.x. The event data decoding algorithm (event adapter) common for the GigE Vision devices can be used.

EnumEntry.Name: Custom
EnumEntry.Description: The device formats the event data using a custom, non-standard format. Without a-priori additional knowledge about the device and its implementation, the GenTL Consumer should always use the generic event adapter to decode the event data, not making any assumptions about the internal event data layout.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Current IP address of the GVCP interface of the remote device.
Integer.Description: Current IP address of the GVCP interface of the remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the remote device.
Integer.Description: Current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Current gateway IP address of the GVCP interface of the remote device.
Integer.Description: Current gateway IP address of the GVCP interface of the remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the remote device.
Integer.Description: 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the remote device.

Boolean.Name: customIsReconnectSupported
Boolean.Description: Flag indicating whether the reconnect feature is supported or not.

Command.Name: customDeviceSaveRemoteDescriptionFileToDisk
Command.ToolTip: Saves the remote device description file (xml file) to disk.
Command.Description: Saves the remote device description file (xml file) to the root of the current user's home directory. The name is taken from the URL string. The original file format (xml/zip) is retained. Note: The function saves only the first announced "local" storage file. Note: If the implementation fails to determine the home directory it tries to save the file to the application's working directory.

Boolean.Name: customIsControlChannelRetrySupported
Boolean.Description: Flag indicating whether the control channel retries are supported or not.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceEndianessMechanism
Enumeration.Description:
Identifies the endianess handling mode.
Currently not implemented by the IDS GenTL Producer.

EnumEntry.Name: Legacy
EnumEntry.Description: Handling the device endianess according to GenICam Schema 1.0.

EnumEntry.Name: Standard
EnumEntry.Description: Handling the device endianess according to GenICam Schema 1.1 and later.

Integer.Name: LinkCommandTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Application timeout for the control channel communication.
Integer.Description:
Specifies the application timeout for the control channel communication. This feature defines the application timeout, and it is related to the device feature DeviceLinkCommandTimeout specifying the maximum time for handling a command in the device. Up to LinkCommandRetryCount attempts with this timeout are made before a command fails with a timout error.
Currently not implemented by the IDS GenTL Producer.

Integer.Name: LinkCommandRetryCount
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum number of tries before failing a control channel command.
Integer.Description:
Specifies the maximum number of tries before failing a control channel command.
Currently not implemented by the IDS GenTL Producer.

Integer.Name: customGevMessageChannelSenderInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the interval (in ms) at which the host sends data to the device.
Integer.Description: Specifies the interval (in ms) at which the host sends data to the device to prevent that a firewall blocks the communication on the message channel. If Gev Message Channel Sender Interval is set to 0, no data is sent to the device.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelNumRetriesOnTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the maximum number of control channel command retries in response to ack timeout.
Integer.Description: Specifies the maximum number of control channel command retries in response to ack timeout.
Integer.DisplayName: Control Channel Num Retries On Timeout

Integer.Name: customStreamCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of streams provided by this device.
Integer.Description: Number of streams provided by this device.

Integer.Name: StreamSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the different stream channels.
Integer.Description: Selector for the different stream channels. The selector is 0-based in order to match the index of the C interface.

StringReg.Name: StreamID
StringReg.ToolTip: Device unique ID for the stream.
StringReg.Description: Device unique ID for the stream. Corresponds to the DevGetDataStreamID function with the index corresponding to "StreamSelector".

Integer.Name: customControlChannelTimeoutCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of control channel timeouts.
Integer.Description: Number of control channel timeouts since the device was opened.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelRejectCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of control channel rejects.
Integer.Description: Number of control channel rejects since the device was opened.

Boolean.Name: customControlChannelRuntimeStatisticsAvailable
Boolean.Description: Flag indicating whether the control channel runtime statistics are available or not.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelReadCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of control channel reads commands.
Integer.Description: Number of control channel read commands since the device was opened. (Only acknowledged commands considered.)

Integer.Name: customControlChannelReadRuntimeMean
Integer.ToolTip: Mean runtime (in ms) of control channel read commands.
Integer.Description: Mean runtime (in ms) of control channel read commands since the device was opened. The runtime is the time between sending the command and receiving the acknoledgement.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelReadRuntimeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum runtime (in ms) of control channel read commands.
Integer.Description: Minimum runtime (in ms) of control channel read commands since the device was opened. The runtime is the time between sending the command and receiving the acknoledgement.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelReadRuntimeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum runtime (in ms) of control channel read commands.
Integer.Description: Maximum runtime (in ms) of control channel read commands since the device was opened. The runtime is the time between sending the command and receiving the acknoledgement.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelWriteCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of control channel write commands.
Integer.Description: Number of control channel write commands since the device was opened. (Only acknowledged commands considered.)

Integer.Name: customControlChannelWriteRuntimeMean
Integer.ToolTip: Mean runtime (in ms) of control channel write commands.
Integer.Description: Mean runtime (in ms) of control channel write commands since the device was opened. The runtime is the time between sending the command and receiving the acknoledgement.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelWriteRuntimeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum runtime (in ms) of control channel write commands.
Integer.Description: Minimum runtime (in ms) of control channel write commands since the device was opened. The runtime is the time between sending the command and receiving the acknoledgement.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelWriteRuntimeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum runtime (in ms) of control channel write commands.
Integer.Description: Maximum runtime (in ms) of control channel write commands since the device was opened. The runtime is the time between sending the command and receiving the acknoledgement.

Integer.Name: customControlChannelRetryOnBusyCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of control channel retries in response to 'busy' acks.
Integer.Description: Number of control channel retries in response to 'busy' acks since the device was opened.
Integer.DisplayName: Control Channel Retry On Busy Count

Integer.Name: customControlChannelRetryOnTimeoutCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of control channel retries in response to ack timeouts.
Integer.Description: Number of control channel retries in response to ack timeouts since the device was opened.
Integer.DisplayName: Control Channel Retry On Timeout Count

Integer.Name: customHeartbeatFailureCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of failed heartbeat transmissions.
Integer.Description: Number of failed heartbeat transmissions since the device was opened.

Boolean.Name: customHeartbeatStatisticsAvailable
Boolean.Description: Flag indicating whether the heartbeat statistics are available or not.

Integer.Name: customHeartbeatCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of heartbeat transmissions.
Integer.Description: Number of heartbeat transmissions since the device was opened. (Failures included. Skips not included.)

Integer.Name: customHeartbeatSkipCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of skipped heartbeat transmissions.
Integer.Description: Number of heartbeat transmissions that were skipped due to heartbeat timer inaccuracy. Since the device was opened.

Integer.Name: customHeartbeatIntervalMean
Integer.ToolTip: Mean heartbeat transmission interval.
Integer.Description: Mean heartbeat transmission interval since the device was opened. (Failures included. Skips not included.)

Integer.Name: customHeartbeatIntervalMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum heartbeat transmission interval.
Integer.Description: Minimum heartbeat transmission interval since the device was opened. (Failures included. Skips not included.)

Integer.Name: customHeartbeatIntervalMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum heartbeat transmission interval.
Integer.Description: Maximum heartbeat transmission interval since the device was opened. (Failures included. Skips not included.)

Boolean.Name: customIsReconnectEnabled
Boolean.Description: Flag indicating whether the reconnect feature is enabled or not. (The reconnect feature is enabled via the corresponding System node.)

Integer.Name: customRemoteDeviceDetachmentCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of remote device detachments.
Integer.Description: Number of remote device detachments since the device was opened.

Integer.Name: customRemoteDeviceReattachmentCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of remote device re-attachments.
Integer.Description: Number of remote device re-attachments since the device was opened.

Port.Name: DevicePort
Port.ToolTip: The GenICam port through which the Device module is accessed.
Port.Description: The GenICam port through which the Device module is accessed.
